item.title: Welcome to my projects and research page!
item.description: I’m a passionate Ph.D. student of Theoretical Physics of Matter, at the department of Physics and Astronomy of University of Padova. I have background in optics and photonics for telecommunications. My current research interests are in theoretical physics of matter: solitons and their stability in classical and quantum field theories highly nonlinear phenomena in Bose-Einstein condensates, Josephson oscillations Due to my background in photonic engineering and ICT, I’m also interested in
